data.text: Ndiela kuzitisa, a Yave, va khatitsika makanda,
Bila luzolo luaku luidi lunneni, luidi luzangama viokila diyilu
Yayusu kuaku, a Nzambi, ku yilu diyilu
Wutuvukisa ayi wutusadisa mu koko kuaku ku lubakala
Nzambi wutuba tona ku buangu kiandi kinlongo :
Minu phuidi Galadi, minu phuidi Manase ;
Mowabi diawu dibola diodi ndieti yobidila.
Nani wela kundata ku divula dikindusu ngolo e ?
Keti ngeyo, a Nzambi, ngeyo wutuloza,
Va kimosi ayi Nzambi, tuela tunga
